reviewText: Looked all around for years for this. This does not have the story about the girl with the magic carpet called "Amanda and the Mysterious Carpet" like the VHS tape, but still really, really cool.

I watched this when I was in school and for some reason, I didn't realize until I brought this home that it's a 14 min short movie. I thought it was longer than that. Teachers even read the book to me at the time. When I tried getting back to it, I also thought it was monster in the closet. I was wrong. Brings back fond memories.
I Love the book therefore I had to buy the movie. Its cute and effect for children and teachers!

This is 2 great videos related to loved children's books. I gave this a lower star rating because I paid 17 dollars for this DVD and another 17 for the other movie that was not listed on this item description.  Very disappointed and angry and considering these movies are only 15 minutes each.

I almost didn't get this since it was so short and made by a company I had never heard of.
Plus it was just a few minutes long.
Our grandson watches it time after time.  He actually likes it better than the book.  I think because he likes the "Nightmare".  I wholeheartedly recommend this short film.

I play this movie for my 4 year olds in my class.  I first read the story and then we review the movie together.  Their attention does not leave the movie.  They really enjoy the book.  They can tell the differences between both movie and book!
I can't wait 2 surprise my daughter with this dvd-She's 17 now & this is 1 of her fav. bedtime stories since she was a little girl-Soo looking 4ward 2 a girl's nite in with my baby girl!
